author: Source: Salisbury Journal
title: Stephen Fry is leaving QI and handing over the reins to panellist Sandi Toksvig - Salisbury Journal
text:
Stephen Fry is to step down as host of BBC Two quiz show QI after 13 years in the role. The 58-year-old actor and presenter said it was "one of the best jobs on television" but felt "it was time to move on".
Start the conversation, or Read more at Salisbury Journal.
